question: You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.You now find that you cannot continue the course.Write a letter to your teachers. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain why you cannot continue at this timesay what action you would like to takeYou do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am writing to inform you that due to my new position as a visual merchandiser in an enormous shop in Tehran that  is full-time, I can not take a part in your great french class.

Unfortunately, from the first moment I started my job, it has full pressure on me. Which I have to stand there overtime for at least four months and because of this reason, I can not join your special course. Therefore, I shall ask you if you could manage another private term for me after these four months and I will promise to study and learn fast to achieve the mark of the exam.
I strongly hope you could do this for me.
I am looking forward to hearing from you as soon as possible.
